page.title: 17LEISURE IN PETERHEAD
page.content: There are over thirty clubs and activities which take place in the community centre during the week and at weekends.They range from ladies keep fit,table tennis and gymnastics to carpet bowls,workers education association and machine knitting. The centre also has clubs for disabled people such as the Disabled group which takes place once weekly and the Blind group.The swimming pool is regulary used by schools in and around Peterhead and by the public.There are also swimming clubs such as Sub Aqua and the "Water Babies."Vandalism in the centre is very high.The front of the centre and the coffee bar are frequently being repainted because of graffitti written by marker pens, tip-ex and spray paint.Some people we asked thought the centre could be improved.
